name: Crittervania-jam-version
description:
Crittervania Help Shoelace the Mouse conquer the lands of Whale Wreckage, Snek Sewers, Cardboard Cat Keep, and Birdseye Bluffs, and find Awesome powerups along the way. Defeat the Three bosses of the kingdoms in this 3D topdown action adventure metroidvania.

Balance must be restored to the animal kingdom to prove that you are indeed the fiercest foe.

Made for Metroidvania Month Jam 8

Features:

  • 3 weapon upgrades
  • 3 animal spirit abilities
  • 3 Boss fights
  • 4 Unique Areas:
    • Whale Wreckage
    • Snek Sewers
    • Cardboard Cats
    • Bird Bluffs

Still has some softlock death screens if you fall out of the level detection boundaries in the wrong places unfortuantely :(
